title: RBI Monetary Policy Highlights: RBI keeps repo rate unchanged at 5.5%; stance remains neutral; cuts inflation estimates
description: RBI Monetary Policy 2025 Highlights: The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) announced its monetary policy today, 6 August 2025. This was the third bi-monthly Monetary Policy Committee (MPC) meeting for FY26, chaired by the RBI Governor Sanjay Malhotra. The MPC meeting was scheduled from August 4 to August ...
